title: AE脚本：图层MASK遮罩随机分段破碎脚本 Aescripts Voronoi Shatter v2.2 + 视频教程
author: 大众脸
content: Aescripts Voronoi Shatter v2.2 脚本可以让图层MASK遮罩随机分段破碎，且还可以随机填充颜色，非常的适用方便。Voronoi Shatter can generate voronoi masks on selected layers and create voronoi shape layers.

script_features: You can use "Random", "Selection" and "Brightness Map" to generate pieces
You can use masks to clip your pieces
You can choose to generate masks or shape layers
